org.crosswire.bibledesktop.book
类 BibleViewPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.crosswire.common.swing.desktop.TabbedPanePanel
                      org.crosswire.bibledesktop.book.BibleViewPane
所有已实现的接口：
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Clearable, TitleChangedListener, Titleable
public class BibleViewPane
extends TabbedPanePanel
implements Titleable, Clearable, TitleChangedListener

A BibleViewPane consists of three areas for looking up passages, for navigating and manipulating parts of passage and for viewing a passage.

作者：
Joe Walker [joe at eireneh dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors., 序列化表格
